A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie had a real strange tone to it compared to all the other movies. It was all over the place\, scenes were over the top\, characters were wasted\, so many questions remain unanswered\, locations were bland and there was also a few weird moments. No awesome fight scenes exception one short bit\, and battle scenes were pointless or just wasted. It didn't feel like Star Wars at all.
